name: Leadership & Management
description: Roles focused on leading teams, driving organizational strategy, and achieving business results through people and processes.
work_environment: Fast-paced, decision-focused, high accountability, people management, strategic planning

name: Analytical & Technical
description: Roles requiring deep technical expertise, analytical problem-solving, and systematic thinking to solve complex challenges.
work_environment: Independent work, technical depth, problem-solving focus, accuracy-driven, innovation-oriented

name: Creative & Design
description: Roles centered on creative expression, visual or experiential design, and bringing innovative ideas to life.
work_environment: Creative freedom, collaborative ideation, variety, aesthetic focus, iterative processes

name: Sales & Business Development
description: Roles focused on generating revenue, building client relationships, and driving business growth through persuasion and networking.
work_environment: Results-driven, relationship-focused, competitive, high autonomy, performance-based rewards

name: Helping & Service
description: Roles dedicated to supporting, helping, and serving othersâ€”whether through healthcare, education, counseling, or social services.
work_environment: People-focused, empathy-driven, supportive culture, relationship-building, meaningful impact

name: Administrative & Operational
description: Roles ensuring smooth operations, maintaining systems, and providing organizational support through structure and reliability.
work_environment: Structured, detail-oriented, supportive role, clear processes, reliability-focused

name: Entrepreneurial & Innovation
description: Roles focused on building new ventures, driving innovation, and creating value through risk-taking and vision.
work_environment: High autonomy, fast-paced, ambiguous, risk-tolerant, vision-driven, outcome-focused

name: Skilled Trades & Craftsmanship
description: Roles requiring hands-on expertise, technical skill, and physical engagement to build, repair, or create tangible products.
work_environment: Hands-on, skill-focused, tangible outcomes, independent or small team work, craftsmanship
